languages.text: {n}Архонт Черного сердца делает небрежный жест — и друкари один за другим начинают таять среди обломков и теней ущелья. Где-то вдалеке ревет ксеносский двигатель — в небо начинают подниматься черные пустотные суда, устремляющиеся вверх.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Архонт Черного сердца делает небрежный жест — и ксеносы один за других начинают таять среди обломков и теней ущелья. Где-то вдалеке взревает двигателями ксеносский двигатель — в небо начинают подниматься черные хищные суда, устремляющиеся вверх.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xenos engines start roaring in the distance as the black voidships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Архонт Черного сердца делает небрежный жест — и друкари один за другим начинают таять среди обломков и теней ущелья. Где-то вдалеке ревет ксеносский двигатель — в небо начинают подниматься черные пустотные суда, устремляющиеся вверх.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xeno engines start roaring in the distance as ravenous silhouettes of the alien ships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

{n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xeno engines start roaring in the distance as ravenous silhouettes of the alien ships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

{n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xenos engines start roaring in the distance as the black voidships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

{n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xenos engines start roaring in the distance as the black voidships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

{n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xenos engines start roaring in the distance as the black voidships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Archon des Schwarzen Herzens gibt ein Zeichen, und die Drukhari verschwinden zwischen dem Schutt und den Schatten der Klamm. Xenos-Triebwerke jaulen in der Ferne auf und die schwarzen Raumschiffe beginnen ihren Aufstieg in den Himmel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xenos engines start roaring in the distance as the black voidships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Archon des Schwarzen Herzens gibt ein Zeichen, und die Drukhari verschwinden zwischen dem Schutt und den Schatten der Klamm. Xenos-Triebwerke jaulen in der Ferne auf und die schwarzen Raumschiffe beginnen ihren Aufstieg in den Himmel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}黑心阴谋团执政官轻蔑地做了个手势，其他黑暗灵族在峡谷的废墟与阴影中消失了。远处传来异形引擎的轰鸣声，黑色的虚空舰朝天空飞去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xenos engines start roaring in the distance as the black voidships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}黑心阴谋团执政官轻蔑地做了个手势，其他黑暗灵族在峡谷的废墟与阴影中消失了。远处传来异形引擎的轰鸣声，黑色的虚空舰朝天空飞去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lorsque l'archonte du Cœur Noir les renvoie d'un geste, les Drukharis se fondent dans le paysage accidenté du ravin. Les moteurs xénos se mettent à rugir et les vaisseaux noirs entament leur ascension.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xenos engines start roaring in the distance as the black voidships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque l'archonte du Cœur Noir les renvoie d'un geste, les Drukharis se fondent dans le paysage accidenté du ravin. Les moteurs xénos se mettent à rugir et les vaisseaux noirs entament leur ascension.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Arconte del Corazón Negro hace un gesto despectivo y los Drukhari se esfuman entre los restos y las sombras del desfiladero. A lo lejos, los motores xenos rugen y las negras naves del vacío despegan hacia los cielos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xenos engines start roaring in the distance as the black voidships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arconte del Corazón Negro hace un gesto despectivo y los Drukhari se esfuman entre los restos y las sombras del desfiladero. A lo lejos, los motores xenos rugen y las negras naves del vacío despegan hacia los cielos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}黒き心臓のアーコンがそっけなく手を振ると、デュカーリは瓦礫と渓谷の影の中へと溶けていく。黒いヴォイドシップが空へと上昇を始めると同時に、遠くで異種族のエンジンのうなりが響き始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xenos engines start roaring in the distance as the black voidships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}黒き心臓のアーコンがそっけなく手を振ると、デュカーリは瓦礫と渓谷の影の中へと溶けていく。黒いヴォイドシップが空へと上昇を始めると同時に、遠くで異種族のエンジンのうなりが響き始めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kara Yürek Arkonu, herkesin gitmesini ifade eden bir el işareti yapıyor. Sonrasında Drukhariler, vadinin yıkıntılarında ve gölgelerinde yavaşça kayboluyor. İleride çalışmaya başlayan zeno motorlarını duyuyorsun, siyah uçsuz gemileri de göğe yükselmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Archon of the Black Heart makes a dismissive gesture, and the Drukhari melt away among the debris and shadows of the ravine. Xenos engines start roaring in the distance as the black voidships begin their ascent into the sky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kara Yürek Arkon'u, gitmeni söyleyen bir el işareti yapıyor ve Drukhariler vadinin yıkıntıları ve gölgeleri arasında yavaş yavaş kayboluyorlar. İleride çalışmaya başlayan zeno motorlarını duyuyorsun ve siyah uçsuz gemileri göğe yükselmeye başlıyor.{/n}
